description:
Libre Sinhala Keyboard
Sithakuru is a Free and Open-Source Sinhalese keyboard.

## Keyboard Layouts
- English
- Wijesekara
- Singlish

## Other facilities
- Light or Dark colors
- Show/hide key borders
- Show Sinhala letters on keys in Wijesekara layout
- Change keyboard height and font size
- Erase or move cursor with swiping
